title: A Ghostbusters animated film is on the way at Sony - and original director Ivan Reitman is producing
text:
0 Movies News A Ghostbusters animated film is on the way at Sony - and original director Ivan Reitman is producing Friday, Oct 2 2015, 02:26 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Hollywood clearly isn't busy enough with both a female and male (allegedly) Ghostbusters to make, as now there's an animated movie on the way too.Sony Pictures Animation is reportedly working on the film with original Ghostbusters director Ivan Reitman on board as producer through his Montecito Picture Company.No writer or director are attached to the project just yet, while plot details are also unknown at this stage. This isn't the first Ghostbusters animation. An animated series followed the first film in the '80s.Sony, meanwhile, is also making a similar animation spun off from its Amazing Spider-Man franchise, written and directed by The Lego Movie 's Phil Lord and Chris Miller . 
Â© Twitter / Leslie Jones Ghostbusters director Paul Feig slams Twitter misogynists: "Go f**k yourself" The main Ghostbusters reboot is coming next summer and stars Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones with Paul Feig directing. Sigourney Weaver will return for a cameo appearance , joining her fellow original cast members Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson and Annie Potts. Ghostbusters finished shooting last month , and is due for release on July 15, 2016.
